name: Delay of Game
description: Offense fail to snap ball before 25-second play clock expires.

name: Illegal Snap
description: Simulated or ‘double snap’ from the Centre.

name: False Start
description: Offensive player moving prior to the snap (exception: motions).

name: OB prior to snap
description: Offensive player out of bounds prior to snap.

name: Illegal Shift / Motion
description: 2 or more players moving in motion at the time of the snap.

name: Offside
description: O/D player is over the LOS when the ball is snapped.

name: Encroachment
description: Defensive player touches the ball / O player before ball is snapped.

name: Disconcerting Signals
description: Defensive player using words/signals to put off an O player prior to snap.

name: Illegal Signal
description: Player signals to blitz less than 7 yards from LOS, invalid signal or more than two players declaring.

name: Ineligible Blitzer
description: Blitzer not starting 7+ yards from LOS prior to snap and/or crossing LOS before ball has been handed off, fake handed off or passed by QB.

name: Delay of Pass
description: QB fails to pass or hand off ball before 7-second timer has expired.

name: Illegal Touching #1
description: Passer touches or catches a pass thrown by themselves, has not touched D player.

name: Illegal Touching #2
description: Offensive player goes out of bounds and then touches the ball (unless forced out by foul play, in which case no penalty on O).

name: Illegal Subsitution #1
description: Offensive player leaves/enters the field after the snapper has touched the ball.

name: Illegal Subsitution #2
description: O/D players leave or enter the field of play after the ball has been snapped.

name: Illegal Participation
description: More than 5 players on the pitch for either O/D.

name: Sideline Interference
description: Coaches and/or players standing outside the team area during a down.

name: Illegal Equipment
description: Player wearing illegal or missing mandatory equipment after being asked to leave. (Timeout charged to offending team / -5 yards and repeat down if no TOs left.)

name: Illegal Forward Pass
description: Player throws ball after progressing beyond LOS or 2nd forward pass on the same play.

name: Illegal Backward Pass
description: Lateral pass to teammate once runner or receiver is beyond LOS.

name: Illegal Rush
description: QB rushes beyond LOS, without the ball having first touched a player other than the Centre, or a defender.

name: Illegal Run Play
description: Run play takes place within the No Run Zone (between 5-yard cone and Endzone).

name: Illegal Hand-Off
description: Ball is handed off beyond the LOS or hand or there is a forward hand-off to snapper.

name: Illegal Kick
description: Ball carrier intentionally kicks the ball to progress it.

name: Flag Guarding
description: An attempt by the runner to avoid a flag pull by covering any part of the flag with a body part or the ball.

name: Jumping
description: Pushing off the ground to significantly raise the level of the flags (Dipping and Spinning are LEGAL.

name: Diving
description: Moving the upper and lower body forward to make it difficult to pull flags / diving for endzone.

name: Shielding
description: Obstructing an opponent without contact by moving into their path (inc. impeding blitzer).

name: Illegal Flag Pull
description: Pulling a flag from an opponent who does not yet have the ball.

name: Intentionally Kicking a Pass
description: Player intentionally kicks a pass or a fumble.

name: Pass Interference
description: O/D player physically interfering with a player during a legal forward pass (only applies while ball is in air, prior to ball being thrown is Illegal Contact). O Fouls = Loss of Down. D Fouls = Automatic First Down.

name: Illegal Contact
description: (inc. Aiming (deliberately initiating contact) and Holding.) O/D player touching an opponent with impact so as to move them off course / touching an official. Automatic First Down for Defensive fouls.

name: Game Interference
description: Coach or substitute interfering with the ball or a player/official during the game. Automatic First Down for Defensive fouls.

name: Unsportsmanlike Conduct #1
description: Use of abusive language or gestures.

name: Unsportsmanlike Conduct #2
description: O/D player not returning the ball to the next spot / dead ball spot after a play.

name: Unsportsmanlike Conduct #3
description: O/D player neither returning a flag to a player or leaving it where it is on the floor (preference is to return to the player, if possible).
